Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier signal problems at O'Hare. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier signal problems at O'Hare.

Blue Line trains are boarding normally at Rosemont.

Trains are moving and normal service has resumed.
